title: Spicy Seville Orange Chicken Wings
directions: In a large pot, combine all ingredients except for the chicken wings.
Cook on medium heat just until the mixture turns smooth and starts to bubble on the edges. Remove from heat.
Place chicken wings in a single layer on a baking sheet and cook for 40-50 minutes until chicken wings turn golden and crispy. Flip half-way through so they cook evenly.
Dump the wings into the large pot with the sauce. Stir wings until evenly coated and serve. Enjoy!
ingredients: ½ jar Crofter’s Organic Seville Orange Just Fruit Spread
